mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item(order_itemno, memberno, order_payno, contentsno, cnt, tot, stateno, rdate) VALUES (order_item_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{order_payno}, #{contentsno}, #{cnt}, #{tot}, #{stateno}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT i.order_itemno, i.memberno, i.order_payno, i.contentsno, i.cnt, i.tot, i.stateno, i.rdate, c.title, c.saleprice FROM order_item i, contents c WHERE (i.contentsno = c.contentsno) AND order_payno=#{order_payno} AND memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY order_itemno DESC
